alert.note: Alert for Eastern Box Elder County; Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains; Northern Wasatch Front (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 11 at 5:17PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...Gusty outflow winds will impact portions of southwestern Weber...southeastern Box Elder...northern Davis and northeastern Tooele Counties through 600 PM MDT... At 516 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Hooper, or near Ogden, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...West wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Ogden, Layton, Hill Air Force Base, Roy, Clearfield, Kaysville, Syracuse, Clinton, South Ogden, Washington Terrace, Riverdale, Hooper, South Weber, Perry, Willard, Marriott-Slaterville, Uintah, Corinne, Great Salt Lake South of the Causeway and South Willard. This includes the following highways... Interstate 15 between mile markers 328 and 359. Interstate 84 between mile markers 82 and 86. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Box Elder County; Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains; Northern Wasatch Front
